params._template: Farm template address to create a farm.

createFarm(uint256,address,bytes).details: Initializes farm with the parameters passed.

params._data: Data to be passed to the farm contract for init.
params._integratorFeeAccount: Address to pay the fee to.
params._templateId: Template id of the farm to create.

params._integratorFeeAccount: Address to pay the fee to.
params._templateId: Template id of the farm to create.

returns._0: Address of the required template ID.
ID of the required template address.
bool True if the account has the role or false if it does not

params._accessControls: Sets address to get the access controls from.
params._minimumFee: Sets a minimum fee for creating farm in the factory.
params._misoDiv: Sets address to send the dividends.

params._templateId: Refers to template ID that is to be deleted.
The ID of the current template for that type

FarmCreated(address,address,address).notice: Event emitted when a farm is created using template id.

FarmTemplateAdded(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when farm template is added to factory.

FarmTemplateRemoved(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when farm template is removed.

MisoInitFarmFactory(address).notice: Event emitted when first initializing the Miso Farm Factory.

accessControls().notice: Responsible for access rights to the contract.

addFarmTemplate(address).notice: Function to add a farm template to create through factory.

createFarm(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Creates a farm corresponding to the _templateId.

deployFarm(uint256,address).notice: Deploys a farm corresponding to the _templateId and transfers fees.

farmInfo(address).notice: Mapping from auction created through this contract to Auction struct.

farmTemplateId().notice: Template id to track respective farm template.

getFarmTemplate(uint256).notice: Get the address based on template ID.

getFarms().notice: Get all farm created in the factory.

getTemplateId(address).notice: Get the ID based on template address.

hasFarmMinterRole(address).notice: Used to check whether an address has the minter role

initMISOFarmFactory(address,address,uint.notice: Single gateway to initialize the MISO Farm factory with proper address.

locked().notice: Contract locked status. If locked, only minters can deploy

minimumFee().notice: Minimum fee to create a farm through the factory.

misoDiv().notice: Any MISO dividends collected are sent here.

numberOfFarms().notice: Get the total number of farms in the factory.

removeFarmTemplate(uint256).notice: Function to remove a farm template.

setCurrentTemplateId(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the current template ID for any type.

setLocked(bool).notice: Sets the factory to be locked or unlocked.
